SELECT t1.proc_inst_id,t1.proc_task_id,t1.proc_task_name,t1.proc_task_status,t1.remark,t1.description, t1.created_name as approverName, t1.created_time as taskInstStartTime,t2.created_time as taskInstEndTime, t2.proc_inst_status,t2.created_by as initiator_id,t2.created_name as initiator_name, t2.proc_inst_version,t2.proc_inst_category_name,t2.proc_def_name,t2.proc_inst_name FROM wp_process_task_his t1 LEFT JOIN wp_process_instance_ext t2 ON t1.proc_inst_id = t2.proc_inst_id
AND t1.created_by = #{req.approverId}
AND t2.proc_def_name LIKE CONCAT(#{req.procDefName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND t1.proc_task_name LIKE CONCAT(#{req.procTaskName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND t2.proc_inst_name LIKE CONCAT(#{req.procInstName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
ORDER BY t1.id DESC
